    • Uses of ValentineESP.VRScanCallback in com.valentine.esp

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean ValentineESP.scanForDevices(ConnectionType connectionType, ValentineESP.VRScanCallback scanCallback, int secondsToScan)
      Starts bluetooth scan based off the ConnectionType.
      boolean ValentineClient.scanForDevices(ConnectionType connectionType, ValentineESP.VRScanCallback scanCallback, int secondsToScan)
      Performs a Bluetooth scan using the specified ConnectionType for X seconds, returning discovered BluetoothDevices using the callback onDeviceFound(BluetoothDeviceBundle, ConnectionType).
